title: 'They were ready to go': Trump again claims that he stopped India-Pak conflict
content: US President Donald Trump claims he resolved India-Pakistan tensions using tariffs, stating he prevented wars. He asserted tariffs make the US a "peacekeeper." However, India maintains de-escalation followed direct military talks, with Prime Minister Modi clarifying no foreign leader pressured India to halt Operation Sindoor after a deadly terror attack.

title: Coldrif tragedy: Drug to fight hooch poisoning antidote to killer cough syrup
content: A drug typically used for hooch poisoning, Fomepizole, proved effective against diethylene glycol (DEG) toxicity from the killer cough syrup Coldrif. This antidote helped save children in Madhya Pradesh who suffered severe kidney damage and brain injury after consuming the contaminated syrup, preventing further fatalities.

title: Bihar assembly elections: BJP, Tejashwi eye spring in autumn of the patriarchs
content: Bihar will vote in assembly polls on November 6 and 11. The Election Commission announced the schedule for 243 seats. Counting will take place on November 14. The elections are set to be a contest between the ruling coalition and the opposition alliance. Voter awareness and improved law and order are cited for the shorter poll duration.

title: 'It starts for us in Pakistan': Proteas captain issues warning
content: South Africa begin its World Test Championship title defence in Pakistan, with Aiden Markram stepping in as captain. The team has undergone specialised training to prepare for the expected spin and lower seam movement in Pakistani conditions. They aim to reach the final again and lift the trophy, acknowledging that all teams will be targeting them.

title: Jaipur ICU blaze: Hospital staff ignored early warnings, say patients' kin
content: Families of victims in the Sawai Man Singh Hospital fire accused staff of ignoring smoke warnings and fleeing. Attendants claim their pleas were dismissed, and hospital personnel were the first to escape. Protests erupted as officials visited, with grieving relatives demanding answers about their loved ones' conditions amidst alleged police interference.

title: H-1B visa shake-up: Trump’s $100,000 fee hike; why global tech startups are ‘happy’
content: Stricter H-1B visa rules in the US are creating opportunities for international tech hubs. Companies in the UK and Canada are positioning themselves to attract top engineering talent previously headed for Silicon Valley. Founders and political leaders see this as a chance to gain a competitive advantage in attracting skilled workers.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock market recommendations for today
content: Stock market recommendations: Mirae Asset Sharekhan's Somil Mehta recommends buying Mahindra & Mahindra (M&M) and Bharat Forge. M&M is expected to resume its uptrend after completing a corrective pattern, with a target of Rs 3,720. Bharat Forge has broken out of a triangle pattern and is poised for an uptrend, aiming for Rs 1,335.

title: Only 14! India must fast-track Suryavanshi like Tendulkar
content: Vaibhav Suryavanshi, 14, is India’s record-breaking prodigy - creating milestones in youth ODIs, T20s, and first-class cricket. Coaches like Zubin Bharucha and Vikram Rathour believe he’s ready to be “blooded” into India A or the senior team immediately. Grounded, fearless, and far ahead of his peers, Suryavanshi could be India’s next big superstar.

title: Trump tariffs: US President announces 25% levies on medium, heavy-duty truck imports
content: US President Donald Trump has announced a significant 25% tariff on all medium and heavy-duty trucks entering the United States, effective November 1, 2025. This move, aimed at bolstering domestic manufacturing and protecting American truck makers from foreign competition, follows a Commerce Department probe into predatory trade practices.  The tariff is part of a broader protectionist agenda.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX wins contracts worth $714 million from Pentagon
content: SpaceX has secured a significant portion of US Space Force's military launch missions for the upcoming fiscal year, bagging five out of seven contracts worth $714 million. This reinforces Elon Musk's company's dominance in Pentagon space deals, while United Launch Alliance secured the remaining two. Blue Origin's rocket is still awaiting certification for these critical national security missions.

title: IND vs PAK: MCC shushes Pakistan; settles controversy vs India
content: The MCC has upheld the third umpire's decision to declare Muneeba Ali run out against India, clarifying a key cricket law. Despite grounding her bat, Muneeba's dismissal was correct as she wasn't running or diving towards her crease when the wicket was broken. This ruling ensures clarity on the 'bouncing bat' law.

title: Happy Valmiki Jayanti 2025: Top 50 wishes, messages and quotes to share
content: Valmiki Jayanti honours Sage Valmiki, the revered author of the ancient epic Ramayana and Adi Kavi. Celebrated across India, this day commemorates his birth and timeless teachings on righteousness, devotion, and virtuous living. The article offers heartfelt wishes, messages, and quotes for 2025, encouraging reflection on his profound wisdom and inspiring communities to uphold truth and virtue.

title: WC: New record! Brits surpasses Mandhana to achieve this historic milestone
content: Tazmin Brits etched her name in history at the 2025 Women's World Cup, scoring a record-breaking fifth ODI century in a calendar year. Her rapid 101 against New Zealand also made her the fastest to seven ODI centuries.  South Africa's Nonkululeko Mlaba's crucial four-wicket haul restricted New Zealand to 231.

title: Arattai launch: Anand Mahindra backs ‘Made in India’ app; Zoho founder replies
content: Zoho's homegrown messaging app, Arattai, has surged in popularity, attracting the attention of industrialist Anand Mahindra. He proudly announced downloading the app, prompting a grateful response from Zoho founder Sridhar Vembu. While Arattai offers familiar features and aims to be spyware-free, it's currently addressing user-reported issues like OTP delays and sync problems.

title: NDA banks on 'Viksit Bihar' plank to counter opposition caste-based drive
content: The NDA, led by BJP and JDU, anticipates a strong victory in Bihar polls, campaigning on a platform of development and good governance, aiming to move past the 'Jungle Raj' era. Opinion polls project a landslide win for the alliance, while the opposition INDIA bloc is expected to focus on caste-based politics.

title: IND vs WI: Gavaskar loses cool; calls Windies pacers 'net bowlers'
content: Former Indian captain Sunil Gavaskar has voiced strong criticism of the West Indies bowling unit.  Following India's decisive innings and 140-run victory in Ahmedabad, Gavaskar questioned the quality of the West Indies attack.  He contrasted the current team with past legendary West Indian players, highlighting a perceived decline in batting talent.  The second Test is set for New Delhi.

title: NASA’s Perseverance rover spots mysterious interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS on Mars
content: NASA's Perseverance rover may have captured early images of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS. While a viral photo shows a bright, cylindrical object, experts suggest it's likely a photographic artifact from long-exposure imaging. Amateur astronomers are analyzing data from the comet's October 3, 2025, flyby, offering a rare glimpse of this unusual visitor.

title: Vanessa Bryant melts hearts cuddling her puppy; calls herself 'proud dog mom'
content: Vanessa Bryant recently warmed hearts by sharing endearing photos and videos with her tiny white puppy on Instagram, playfully embracing her "dog mom" era. This isn't her first pet, as she also has a German Shepherd named Loki, continuing a long tradition of pet ownership and sharing moments of love and healing with her followers.

title: Inside Alex Ovechkin and Anastasia Shubskaya’s love story
content: Alex Ovechkin's record-breaking hockey career, culminating in surpassing Wayne Gretzky's goal record in April 2025, is deeply intertwined with the unwavering support of his wife, Anastasia Shubskaya. Her background in modeling and film, coupled with their shared family values, forms the heart behind his legendary achievements, making her an indispensable factor in his success.

title: Taylor Swift’s $350K Italian gift for Travis Kelce tops her romantic gestures
content: Taylor Swift celebrated Travis Kelce's 36th birthday with a lavish $350,000 Italian-themed surprise, featuring an F1 track experience, luxury watches, and designer items. This grand gesture, made after she missed his birthday, highlights their genuine partnership. The couple, engaged in August 2025, continues to balance their demanding careers with their devotion.

title: How eating a single clove daily can improve heart health & manage cholesterol
content: Discover how the humble clove, a common kitchen spice, offers significant benefits for heart health. Rich in eugenol and antioxidants, cloves can effectively lower bad cholesterol (LDL) while boosting good cholesterol (HDL), reducing inflammation, and combating oxidative stress. Just one clove daily may protect against heart disease and improve overall cardiovascular function, according to recent studies.

title: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt’s Austin health scare leaves her rethinking wellness
content: Kansas City Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt recently experienced an "eye-opening" holistic wellness assessment at Medici Health, Austin. This comprehensive check-up, spanning heart screenings to vision tests, profoundly highlighted the critical importance of proactive self-care before health issues emerge. Hunt lauded the compassionate team and the Phillips family's vision, advocating for health as a continuous, empowering journey for all.

title: India-Bangladesh ties: Hasina issue needs consultations, says Vikram Misri
content: India supports an early, free, and fair election in Bangladesh, stating that matters concerning former PM Sheikh Hasina are judicial and require consultations. Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri emphasized India's readiness to engage with any government emerging from a popular mandate, despite acknowledging some issues in bilateral ties.

title: 'Rohit will be 41 in 2027 WC': Ex-cricketer justifies captaincy change
content: Shubman Gill is the new ODI captain for India's Australia tour.  This move prepares for the 2027 World Cup.  Rohit Sharma, the current captain, will not lead the ODI side.  Gill aims to win the World Cup.  India will play around 20 ODIs before the tournament.  Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli will return to cricket.

title: Ladakh unrest: Leh group questions government’s normalcy claim
content: Ladakh's Leh Apex Body (LAB) rejected government claims of normalcy, accusing authorities of harassing village heads (gobas) for informing their communities about protests. LAB co-chairman Chhering Dorje Lakruk stated this harassment is an attack on their culture. The group demands internet restoration, an end to arrests, and the lifting of restrictions to rebuild public confidence.

title: Madhya Pradesh: 100s of voter IDs found in pond; probe ordered
content: Hundreds of genuine voter ID cards, all from Ward No. 15, were discovered floating in Raja Talab in Chhatarpur district, Madhya Pradesh. Found inside a bag during a cleaning drive, locals claim they are undistributed cards. A preliminary inquiry has been ordered, sparking political accusations of irregularities.

title: Is it regular back pain or pancreatic cancer? How to recognise warning signs
content: Back pain, now common across age groups, is usually benign but can rarely mask serious conditions like pancreatic cancer. This article reveals how persistent back pain, particularly when accompanied by unexplained weight loss, jaundice, or digestive issues, might be a critical warning sign. Early pancreatic cancer symptoms are often subtle, making differentiation crucial for timely diagnosis and improved treatment outcomes.

title: Centre revises price list: CGHS rates for tests, procedures increased
content: Central government has updated rates for nearly 2,000 CGHS tests and procedures. This revision, effective October 13, aims to help over 40 lakh beneficiaries access treatment at top hospitals. Some rates have seen significant increases, with differential pricing based on hospital accreditation and city classification. This move addresses long-standing issues for beneficiaries.

title: Donald Trump thanks Brittany Mahomes amid fan buzz over Taylor Swift fallout
content: Brittany Mahomes' public support for Donald Trump has sparked online backlash and resurfaced past statements. Amidst this, rumors suggest a fallout with Taylor Swift, with fans speculating Swift's new song 'Cancelled' is about their alleged rift. While Brittany has defended her political stance, Patrick Mahomes remains private about his beliefs.

title: Bihar polls: No SIRround sound; EC silent on number of 'aliens' deleted
content: Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar declined to provide a specific figure for illegal foreign immigrants removed from Bihar's electoral rolls. He stated the data is decentralized with electoral registration officers. Kumar highlighted over 68 lakh deletions overall due to death, shifting, or being untraced, with foreign nationals potentially included in the 'untraced' category.

title: NSA on Sonam Wangchuk: SC issues notice to Centre, UT on wife's plea
content: The Supreme Court issued a notice to the Centre and Ladakh UT regarding Sonam Wangchuk's wife's plea challenging his NSA detention. While refusing an interim order for the grounds of arrest to the wife, the court questioned why they should be withheld. The hearing is scheduled for October 14.

title: Bengal floods: Toll hits 36, five of the victims are from Nepal
content: Flood waters receding in north Bengal have revealed eight more bodies, bringing the total death toll to 36. Chief Minister Banerjee announced Rs 5 lakh compensation and jobs for families of the deceased, while addressing the devastation in Mirik and promising swift restoration of a key bridge.

title: Madison Beer’s confession resurfaces after sideline moment with Justin Herbert
content: Los Angeles Chargers' star Justin Herbert and singer Madison Beer were seen sharing a romantic moment on the sidelines, seemingly confirming their relationship after weeks of speculation. Beer previously spoke about overcoming self-doubt and believing she deserved love. Herbert had previously denied their romance, calling Beer a friend he met through chess.

title: Carcass of 'poached' tiger found in MP, 2 forest officials suspended
content: A decomposed tiger carcass, suspected to be a poaching victim, was discovered in Bandhavgarh Tiger Reserve. Forest officials have suspended two personnel for alleged negligence. The State Tiger Strike Force is investigating the cause of death. Meanwhile, a tigress and her three cubs are also reported missing, raising further concerns within the reserve.

title: Jaipur SMS hospital fire: 2 police officers brave flames to rescue patients
content: Two constables, Hari Mohan and Lalit Sharma, bravely entered a burning ICU at SMS Hospital to evacuate critically ill patients. Despite heavy smoke and personal distress, they rescued at least 12 patients, including a boy with a head injury. Their quick actions, alongside hospital staff, ensured most patients were safely moved before the fire claimed six lives.

title: Rajasthan: Blaze at Jaipur's SMS hospital kills 8 in ICU; high court asks 'what's happening '
content: Eight critically ill patients perished in a devastating fire at Jaipur's SMS Medical College Neuro ICU late Sunday. The blaze, suspected to be a short-circuit, spread rapidly, with allegations of delayed response and staff fleeing. The Rajasthan government has announced compensation and ordered a safety audit, suspending officials and cancelling a fire safety agency's contract.

title: Lawyer tries to hurl shoe at CJI in court; suspended
content: A lawyer's attempt to hurl shoes at Chief Justice of India B.R. Gavai in an SC courtroom was thwarted by security. The lawyer, shouting slogans, was later released. The incident, linked to social media distortions about the CJI's remarks, has drawn widespread condemnation from legal bodies and political parties, who view it as an attack on judicial independence.

title: Tom Brady says he felt distant from Gisele Bündchen before split
content: Tom Brady once revealed cracks in his marriage with Gisele Bündchen, admitting she felt he wasn't contributing enough to family life. Years later, the couple divorced in 2022. While Brady remains single, Bündchen has reportedly started a new family with her boyfriend, Joaquim Valente, two and a half years post-divorce.

title: Divided States: White House and Texas v California, Oregon, and Illinois
content: A federal judge in Oregon blocked President Trump from deploying federal troops to Portland, citing a lack of factual basis for claims of "insurrection." This ruling, alongside a fire-bombing incident at a judge's home, escalates tensions between the Trump administration and Democrat-run states over federal immigration enforcement and the potential for military rule.

title: Attack on CJI Gavai: Political leaders unite in condemnation
content: Political leaders across party lines have condemned the attack on Chief Justice of India, Justice BR Gavai. Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke to the CJI, calling the act reprehensible and unacceptable in society. Opposition leaders expressed anguish, labeling the incident "unprecedented, shameful and abhorrent," and an assault on the Constitution and judiciary.

title: Cough syrup row: Madhya Pradesh drug controller transferred, 3 others suspended
content: Tragedy struck Chhindwara as 15 children died after allegedly consuming Coldrif cough syrup. In response, Madhya Pradesh transferred its drugs controller and suspended three subordinates. The Chief Minister visited affected families, while police arrested a doctor who prescribed the syrup. The NHRC has ordered inquiries and sample testing across multiple states.

title: Spurs legend Tony Parker’s father passes away unexpectedly at 70
content: Tony Parker Sr., father of NBA legend Tony Parker, has passed away at 70. A former professional player himself, he later managed his son's career, contributing significantly to the Parker family's basketball dynasty. The basketball world mourns his sudden loss, with tributes pouring in for his dedication to the sport and his lasting influence.

title: Connor McDavid’s Oilers future in doubt as owner Daryl Katz grows impatient
content: Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid's contract uncertainty is causing significant unease within the franchise as he enters his final year. Owner Daryl Katz is reportedly "antsy" over the delay, despite no animosity. NHL insider Darren Dreger suggests a 50-50 chance of an extension, possibly a short-term deal, leaving the team's future in McDavid's hands.

title: MUDA scam case: ED attaches 34 more properties worth over Rs 40 crore
content: The Enforcement Directorate has attached 34 more properties valued at over Rs 40 crore in the Mysore Urban Development Authority (MUDA) land scam case, bringing the total to over Rs 440 crore.

title: Oral microbes found as new risk factor for pancreatic cancer
content: A groundbreaking study reveals a surprising link between oral microbes and pancreatic cancer risk. Researchers found certain bacteria and fungi, including those causing gum disease, significantly raise the likelihood of developing this deadly "silent killer." This discovery offers new avenues for early detection through oral microbiome profiling and prevention strategies, urging further research into causation.

title: Bihar: NDA vs MGB & the 'PK factor' - who has edge in 'mother of all elections'
content: Bihar gears up for assembly elections, announced by the Election Commission for November 6 and 11. The NDA, led by JD(U) and BJP, faces a united opposition under RJD's Tejashwi Yadav. New entrant Jan Suraaj, led by Prashant Kishor, also aims to contest all 243 seats, setting the stage for a multi-cornered contest.

title: Dodgers stay playoff perfect, take 2-0 NLDS lead
content: After breezing past the Cincinnati Reds in the wild-card round, the defending champion Los Angeles Dodgers have kept up the momentum against the Phillies, and with Monday's Game 2 victory in Philadelphia, they now have a 2-0 NLDS advantage.

title: Chargers placing top RB Hampton (ankle) on IR
content: Chargers starting running back Omarion Hampton will be placed on injured reserve due to an ankle injury, coach Jim Harbaugh said Monday.

title: Gannon apologizes to Demercado for sideline spat
content: Arizona Cardinals coach Jonathan Gannon said he apologized to Emari Demercado after a heated sideline conversation following the RB's unforced fumble.

title: Sanchez now facing felony charge for altercation
content: Mark Sanchez is facing a felony battery charge over the altercation between the former NFL quarterback and a 69-year-old truck driver early Saturday in Indianapolis.

title: Bills benched WR Coleman for disciplinary reasons
content: Buffalo Bills wide receiver Keon Coleman was benched for the first offensive series of Sunday night's loss to the New England Patriots for "discipline," head coach Sean McDermott said Monday.

title: Tarleton State's Gillispie reinstated after review
content: Tarleton State has reinstated men's basketball coach Billy Gillispie, who was placed on temporary administrative leave Friday following an investigation into an anonymous complaint.

title: Auburn moving '26 game to Atlanta for NIL gain
content: Auburn is moving its 2026 home game with Baylor to Atlanta as part of an arrangement with the Aflac Kickoff Game to provide NIL opportunities for its players.

title: Panthers receive Cup rings, prep for banner night
content: The Florida Panthers handed out the rings from their second consecutive Stanley Cup title Monday, a day before the franchise will raise its back-to-back title banner on Opening Night, when they take on the Chicago Blackhawks at Amerant Bank Arena.

title: ❓LeBron's cryptic post drives Lakers ticket spike
content: After LeBron's "Second Decision" tease, prices for the Lakers' home finale vs. Jazz soared, per Vivid Seats.

title: 'Beyond repair': Napheesa Collier, Cathy Engelbert and a WNBA teetering on the brink
content: Amid the WNBA Finals, two of the most powerful people in the game are locked in a contentious battle -- for public opinion, power and money.

title: Early NBA trade guide: Two timelines, superstar futures and apron issues
content: Closing championship windows, new front offices and wild-card teams all highlight Bobby Marks' early NBA trade preview.

title: Mariners-Brewers? Yankees-Dodgers ... again?! The best World Series matchup for every type of fan
content: We're down to eight teams. Here's what Fall Classic matchup you should be pulling for if your squad isn't playing in October.

title: Winners and losers of Connor McDavid's contract extension
content: No. 97 is sticking with the Oilers through 2027-28 -- with a wide range of downstream impacts around the NHL.

title: Where Penn State, Texas go from here and other key developments in Week 6
content: How bleak are things for Penn State and Texas? What's next in the ACC and Big 12? Bill Connelly has answers.

title: The Cardinals really lost? The Eagles and Rams, too? Barnwell on three embarrassing Week 5 letdowns
content: We saw blown leads, bad turnovers, tough calls and one of the weirdest TDs you'll see all season. Let's stack three head-scratching losses from NFL Week 5.

title: Questions, takeaways off every game: Patriots shock Bills; Bucs and Titans win thrillers
content: NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions out of each game. Here's what we learned in Week 5.

title: A Travis Hunter on every NFL team? 32 players who could be two-way threats
content: The Jaguars rookie plays both wide receiver and cornerback. We found other versatile players across the league.

title: Don't know which UWCL team to support? We can help
content: The UEFA Women's Champions League now has 18 teams, but which should you root for? Current champions Arsenal? Pass masters Barcelona? Winning machine OL Lyonnes? Or someone else?

title: The VAR Review: Should Arsenal's penalty have been overturned? Plus, Man United's spot-kick escape
content: Should Arsenal's penalty against West Ham have been cancelled? What happened with Sunderland's overturned spot kick at Manchester United?

title: Lamine Yamal is key for Barcelona and Spain, but is he headed for burnout?
content: The teenager is the natural heir to Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo, but he's played a lot at a young age.

title: Fantasy Football Buzz: Hampton headed to IR, Gibson out for the year
content: A closer look at the injury updates coming out of Week 5, and the top candidates to replace Omarion Hampton in the Chargers' backfield.

title: Week 5 fantasy football winners and losers: Taylor, Egbuka, Dowdle shine
content: Key running backs and a rookie seized opportunities, but two of the most reliable stars didn't get the job done.

title: Miami dominance and a UCLA stunner: Recapping a chaotic Week 6
content: In Week 6, the Grim Reaper came for Penn State and Texas, but Miami proved itself against Florida State.

title: NFL draft risers, questions and notes: What to make of Nico Iamaleava, Carson Beck in this QB class
content: Does Nico Iamaleava fit into the 2026 class? Could Miami stack first-rounders? We have updates on NFL prospects through CFB Week 6.

title: Singapore shows McLaren's management of title rivals will only get harder
content: Another flash point between Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri showed McLaren's ordeal in managing its drivers.

title: MLS Power Rankings: Philly wins Shield, red-hot LAFC rolling
content: After clinching the Supporters' Shield, there can be no question who's on top of ESPN's MLS Power Rankings: the Philadelphia Union.

title: NFL Week 5's top performance?: Check the  fan-voted 'Himmy' Award leaderboard
content: Stefon Diggs, Emeka Egbuka, Jacory Croskey-Merritt or Rico Dowdle  -- find out who earned Week 5's "Himmy."

title: After regaining the light heavyweight belt at UFC 320, Alex Pereira should move to heavyweight
content: Now that Pereira is a champ again, the UFC should give the fans the heavyweight blockbuster they want.

title: Five position battles to watch during NBA preseason
content: With the NBA preseason under way, Eric Moody highlights the key position battles that fantasy managers need to watch closely.

title: Draft guide: All you need to win your league this season
content: We've got everything you need to help you prepare for and execute a successful draft, all in one place.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Araújo linked with move to Liverpool
content: Liverpool are among the clubs linked with Barcelona and Uruguay center back Ronald Araújo. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: TGL Season 2 schedule: How to watch matches on ESPN networks
content: The tech-infused golf league, fronted by Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy, plays its matches at SoFi Center in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida.

title: Israel, Hamas Hold Talks On Gaza Peace Plan As War Marks 2 Years
content: Israel and Hamas began indirect talks on ending the war in Gaza on Monday, after both sides signaled support for U.S. President Donald Trump's peace plan.

title: "A Country That Bombs Its People": India Tears Into Pakistan At UN
content: Speaking during the Open Debate on Women, Peace and Security, India's Parvathaneni Harish said that Pakistan conducts "systematic genocide".

title: "Trade Calculations Overturned": S Jaishankar Warns Of "Tariff Volatility"
content: Trade calculations are being overturned by "tariff volatility" globally, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said on Monday against the backdrop of economic disruptions triggered by Washington's policy on trade tariffs.

title: "US Peacekeeper Because Of Tariffs": Trump's Big Claim On India-Pak Truce
content: US President Donald Trump has reiterated his claim that he brokered a peace deal between neighbours India and Pakistan using trade threats.

title: Heavy Overnight Rain, Thunderstorms Hit Delhi, Temperature Drops
content: The national capital experienced a few spells of light to moderate rain at many places, accompanied by thunderstorms, lightning, and gusty winds with speeds of 30-40 kmph during the early morning hours on Tuesday.

title: Bihar Polls: Delhi Court Seeks Poll Body's Reply On Party's Plea For Symbol
content: The Delhi High Court on Monday sought he Election Commission's response on a plea by Akhil Bharatiya Jan Sangh seeking allotment of a poll symbol for the upcoming Bihar election.

title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Requests To Serve Sentence At Low-Level New Jersey Jail
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs' lawyers want the hip-hop mogul sent to a low-security federal prison in New Jersey to serve his four-year, two-month prison sentence, telling a judge Monday that the facility's drug treatment program will help him stay clean.

title: High Court Questions Delhi Over Delay In Transgender Reservation In Jobs
content: The Delhi High Court on Monday said that the Delhi Government has failed to implement the reservation policy for transgenders in public employment in accordance with a 2014 Supreme Court judgment.

title: Brazil's Lula Asks Trump To Remove Tariffs In "Friendly" Phone Call
content: Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva urged US President Donald Trump to lift punitive trade tariffs in their first official talks Monday after months of animosity -- with both suggesting an in-person meeting in the near future.

title: Hamas, Israel Open Talks In Egypt Under Trump's Gaza Peace Plan
content: Delegations from Hamas and Israel on Monday began indirect talks in Egypt's Sharm El-Sheikh on ending the nearly two-year war in Gaza, under a plan put forward by US President Donald Trump.

title: Israel Deports Greta Thunberg, 160 Gaza Flotilla Activists To Greece
content: Swedish activist Greta Thunberg landed in Greece on Monday alongside scores of fellow campaigners expelled from Israel after trying to ship aid to Gaza, AFP journalists saw.

title: Trump Says Hamas "Agreeing To Things That Are Very Important"
content: US President Donald Trump said Monday that he was "pretty sure" a Gaza peace deal was possible and said Hamas was agreeing to "very important" issues as talks with Israel started.

title: Karnataka Bans Cough, Cold Syrups For Children Under 2 Years
content: The Karnataka Health Department on Monday issued an advisory to healthcare institutions in the state not to prescribe or dispense cough and cold syrups to children below the age of two, following child deaths in Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan.

title: Jharkhand Bans Cough Syrups Following Children Death In Other States
content: The Jharkhand government imposed an immediate ban on the sale and use of three cough syrups Coldrif, Respifresh, and Relife following reports of child deaths allegedly linked to the medicines in Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan, officials said.

title: PM Modi vs Mamata Banerjee Over Assault On BJP Leaders In Bengal
content: West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee on Sunday launched a blistering attack on Prime Minister Narendra Modi after he criticised the Trinamool Congress (TMC) government over the assault on two BJP leaders in the northern part of the state.

title: Internet Ban Extended Till October 7 After Clashes In Odisha's Cuttack
content: The Odisha government on Monday extended the suspension of internet services in Cuttack till 7 PM of October 7, as tension prevails in the city following back to back violent incidents during the Durga idol immersion last week.

title: 'Wasn't Possible Before Nov 6': Poll Body On Early Election Demand In Bihar
content: Amid demands by political parties to hold Bihar assembly polls immediately after Chhath festival, Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar on Monday said November 6 was "perhaps" the earliest elections that could be held in Bihar.

title: To Test Free Movement, Manipur Runs Buses With Police And BSF Protection
content: In a move to restore safe and free movement in Manipur, a trial run of passenger vehicles on the Imphal-Senapati stretch of National Highway 2 started on Saturday.

title: Case Filed Against Delhi Man For Posing As PMO Official
content: The CBI has registered an FIR against a Delhi resident for allegedly seeking favours from various institutions, including the Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanam, by posing as an official of the Prime Minister's Office

title: Bihar Assembly election LIVE updates: Prashant Kishor to contest polls, Jan Suraaj Party to name candidates on Oct 9
content: Congress leader Pawan Khera has alleged that the Election Commission has not provided satisfactory answers on the issue of voter list revisions

title: Prashant Kishor says he’ll contest Bihar polls; Jan Suraaj Party to name candidates on October 9
content: The Assembly elections in Bihar will be held in two phases on November 6 and 11, while votes will be counted on November 14

title: CM Stalin inaugurates hospital buildings, hands over enhanced pension to retired priests
content: The CM also virtually inaugurated 20 hostels, 37 school buildings and housing units under the Tholkudi programme, 16 village knowledge centres and nine multi-purpose centres constructed by the Adi Dravidar and Tribal Welfare Department at a total cost of ₹209 crore.

title: ‘Global South scientists can tip red tape by thinking, working together’
content: Bureaucratic delays, outdated procurement rules, and chronic underfunding are all hallmarks of doing science in India. But according to Sammy Wambua from Pwani University in Kenya, there are reasons to be optimistic and to believe creativity and solidarity can keep science ticking even in the toughest environments

title: Early snowfall brings cheer to tourists; chilly weather sets in across Kashmir
content: Authorities have instructed drivers to carry appropriate safety equipment, including snow skid chains

title: Rajasthan women break social barriers through filmmaking
content: Women of all ages, once bound by the shackles of child marriage, are scripting new futures – one frame at a time

title: Infopark Kochi seeks State govt. clarification on conversion from charitable society to company
content: The clarification sought is whether Infopark should be registered as a for-profit or a non-profit company; the new corporate structure will legally enable the IT hub to own, develop, and manage such a large-scale commercial project and enter into the necessary contractual agreements for the land-pooling scheme

title: Now, scammers eye city gas project
content: With the city gas project expanding across six divisions of the Corporation, scammers are targeting customers through fraudulent phone calls. Some victims have lost money after sharing OTPs or clicking on malicious links sent via WhatsApp

title: Hibi seeks steps to ease congestion at railway stations in Kochi
content: Ernakulam MP urges the Railways to develop the Ernakulam marshalling yard as a new terminal with four platforms

title: Congress in touch with NC leadership over Rajya Sabha seats, says Tanvir Sadiq
content: The National Conference says it is in talks with Congress to finalise a seat-sharing arrangement for the upcoming Rajya Sabha elections in Jammu and Kashmir and plans to field only local candidates

title: Maharashtra Minister heads anti-bribery inspection, finds hidden cash
content: Although the registration process has been fully digitised, residents in Nagpur had complained that certain officials demanded illegal payments

title: Doctors from area and district hospitals to join PHC doctors’ strike from October 7
content: At present, more than 2,800 primary health centre doctors have been taking part in protests across the State

title: Maharashtra citizens are safe as no Coldrif syrup is supplied in the State, says FDA
content: Despite no confirmed supply in the state, Maharashtra FDA urges public vigilance over toxic cough syrup.

title: Supreme Court clears deck for appointment of V-Cs to 8 State varsities in Bengal
content: The top court said appointments to varsities where the State and Governor could not reach a consensus would be examined separately in chamber proceedings

title: Odisha CM unveils ₹1,100 crore development package for Nuapada ahead of bypoll
content: Odisha CM Mohan Majhi also announced the upgradation of three regions in Nuapada to urban status ahead of the upcoming bypoll on November 11; the Congress hints at fielding Ghasiram Majhi

title: One rhinoceros dead, several wild animals feared displaced in north Bengal floods
content: While forest officials confirmed there was no major loss of wildlife in the flood-hit Dooars region, local wildlife activists claim that several animals, including deer and Indian gaur, have been found dead

title: Supreme Court orally moots transferring cash-for-jobs scam trial involving former Tamil Nadu Minister outside the State
content: If the trial is started in any other place, witnesses can depose online. If found innocent, he can resume public life and hold positions in government, says Justice Surya Kant

title: Supreme Court pulls up man claiming to be father of Russian children found in a cave at Gokarna
content: The petitioner, identified as Dror Shlomo Goldstein, challenged a Karnataka High Court decision allowing the Centre to grant travel documents to the mother and children for their repatriation to Russia

title: India ‘firm’ about ‘free, fair, inclusive and participatory’ election in Bangladesh: Foreign Secretary Misri
content: Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri said the election in Bangladesh will have to have “internal legitimacy”, and cautioned that the polls will also have to acquire “external legitimacy”

title: Assam cabinet approves introduction of Unified Pension Scheme
content: “The cabinet also approved the Assam State Tertiary Healthcare Augmentation (ASTHA) project worth ₹4,287 crore,” the Assam CM said

title: Attack on BJP MP, MLA in north Bengal appalling: Modi
content: Prime Minister says the incident highlights “absolutely pathetic law and order situation in West Bengal”. Mamata Banerjee said that it was unfortunate that PM chose to politicise a natural disaster without waiting for a proper investigation.

title: CJI Gavai’s calm demeanour is reminiscent of predecessor’s presence of mind 57 years ago before a knife-wielding attacker
content: On March 13, 1968, then Chief Justice of India M. Hidayatullah wrestled a knife-wielding man in the court room to save his fellow judge Justice A.N. Grover’s life. After a police officer cuffed the assailant, the CJI asked the officer not to manhandle the man.

title: Conclave in November to showcase ‘evolution’ of Indian science
content: It is not a mere “upgrade” of the traditional Indian Science Congress, says Science Minister Jitendra Singh

title: After central Bengaluru, signal synchronisation to ease Old Madras Road stretch
content: The plan involves synchronising a 2–2.5 km stretch between N.G.E.F. Junction and Anjaneya Junction, covering Double Road and 80 ft. Road junctions

title: Both NDA and INDIA bloc promise to form new government in Bihar
content: While NDA highlights development and governance, the Opposition pitches change and promises of a better future under new leadership

title: ‘Tunnel Road will take away six acres of Lalbagh land, damage the ecosystem’
content: Activists say the loss of canopy and green cover within a designated botanical garden is the worst kind of developmental irony

title: India’s interests are best secured by strategic autonomy: Jaishankar at JNU
content: As the U.S. ramps up pressure to end India’s Russian oil imports, and the global order unravels, Jaishankar makes a stronger case for multi-alignment, multipolarity

title: Operation Sindoor demonstrated Indian Army’s AI-driven capabilities, says Lt. General Rajiv Sahni
content: AI has become a force multiplier for the Army with enhanced surveillance, intelligence, and precision targeting, says the senior Army officer who was Direct General of Information Systems (DGIS) during the military operation against Pakistan

title: Bihar Assembly polls to be held in two phases on November 6 and 11; counting on November 14
content: Chief Election Commissioner Gyanesh Kumar also announces bye-election to eight constituencies across seven States on November 11. In Bihar, the gazette notification for the first phase of polling will be issued on October 10, and the last date to file nominations is October 17. For the second phase, the notification will be issued on October 13, and the last date to file nominations is October 20.

title: T.N. government issues SOP for operating giant wheels
content: The SOP follows certain accidents involving ‘giant wheels’, and will apply to permanent Ferris wheels at amusement parks and temporary ones at trade fairs, exhibitions, and temple festivals

title: Bihar poll dates out but coalition partners yet to finalise seat sharing
content: In the NDA, the JD(U) could contest 107 seats and the BJP 105, leaving 31 seats for the other constituents; in the Opposition bloc, RJD may contest 130 seats, leaving 113 for the Congress and other parties

title: Govt. extends Social and Educational Survey till October 24
content: Govt. and aided schools to function from 8 a.m. to 1 p.m. to facilitate teachers to take up enumeration

title: J&K government removes officer who imposed social media gag on teachers without approval
content: Jammu and Kashmir Education Minister Sakina Itoo calls the move unilateral and warns that officials acting without authority will face strict action

title: PM Modi calls CJI after attack in Supreme Court, says incident has ‘angered all Indians’
content: The Prime Minister’s call and post come after Chief Justice Gavai was attacked by a lawyer who threw what looked like a sheaf of papers at the Supreme Court judge during a hearing of a case

title: Social and Educational Survey gets extension amid a range of complaints from people
content: From wrong addresses and irrigation pumpsets to abandoned or locked homes, enumerators are facing uphill task; complaints of enumerators not taking data from willing families also surface

title: Indian Army inaugurates tent homestays in Uttarakhand
content: The facility was launched in Garbyang, a tri-junction of India, Nepal, and Tibet, that holds strategic and spiritual significance

title: Oncology spending rises under Chief Minister’s Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme
content: Health officials say the amount spent on oncological treatments — medical, surgical, and radiation — was ₹142 crore in 2023, ₹147 crore in 2024, and ₹84 crore till August this year

title: Odisha extends Internet shutdown in Cuttack for another 24 hours as precautionary measure
content: Officials said the extension was a precautionary measure to prevent any possible flare-up or spread of misinformation that could reignite tensions

title: Navy commissions its second ASW-class ship INS Androth
content: INS Androth is specially designed to undertake anti-submarine operations in coastal and shallow waters.

title: Ticket seekers crowd party offices in Patna on day of ECI’s announcement for Bihar election
content: Large number of ticket aspirants were seen outside the offices of the ruling JD(U) and BJP along with the Opposition RJD in Patna’s Beerchand Patel Path with hopes of making the political plunge

title: 400 SHG conservancy workers did not report for work, Greater Chennai Corporation contractor tells Madras High Court
content: Delhi MSW Solutions Limited says all 821 self-help group workers were given appointment letters; judges direct the organisation representing the workers to respond to the complaint

title: Mobile phone usage hinders children’s creativity, says expert
content: ‘Nowadays, many parents hand over mobile phones to their children to make them eat or stay occupied while they attend to their own work. This habit makes children addicted to mobile phones’

title: Supreme Court defers hearing on Vodafone-Idea plea against ₹9,450-crore AGR demand to October 13
content: Vodafone-Idea’s plea against DoT’s ₹9,450-crore AGR demand will now be heard on October 13, with the telecom major seeking waiver of interest and penalties

title: Crimes against elderly people on the rise in Kochi: NCRB
content: This marks a sharp increase from the 74 such incidents reported in 2022 and just 28 cases in 2021; chargesheeting rate for crimes against senior citizens in the city in 2023 is 74.5%

title: India, Australia to sign joint defence and security cooperation declaration
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh’s upcoming visit to Australia underscores the growing momentum in the defence partnership and its pivotal role in ensuring stability across the Indo-Pacific, says official

title: Air India Express will reinstate withdrawn services from Kerala, says Chief Minister
content: Flights from the State to popular international routes will be reinstated in the winter schedule itself, AIE officials say at a meeting

title: CM Stalin should call for an all-party meeting immediately to come out with SOPs for political public meetings, says Annamalai
content: K. Annamalai added that Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi (VCK) president Thol Thirumavalavan was talking against the BJP government at the Centre and TVK leader and actor Vijay because several VCK cadre were joining other parties

title: Excise officials raid bar and restaurant in Ibrahimpatnam, seize 22,000 empty bottles
content: After busting spurious liquor racket in Annamayya district, simultaneous raids have been conducted on the illegal bottling unit run by accused A. Janardhana Rao, say Prohibition and Excise officials

title: Cough syrup tragedy: IMA protests against doctor’s arrest
content: The prescribing doctor has no way of knowing whether a medicine is contaminated until adverse outcomes are reported among patients who have taken it, the Indian Medical Association said in a statement

title: 'India's rise taking place in turbulent era': EAM on new world order; challenges lie ahead
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics .

title: Best of Week 5's arrivals, featuring Patrick Mahomes

title: WWE Crown Jewel: Key stats and info to know before Saturday's premium live event
content: the premium live event (PLE) will be headlined by a pair of matches for the men's and women's crown jewel championships . undisputed WWE champion Cody Rhodes will challenge world heavyweight champion seth Rollins in one match .

title: Your guide to the Aces going up 2-0 against the Mercury in the 2025 WNBA Finals
content: the no. 2 Las Vegas Aces beat the Phoenix Mercury 91-78 in Game 2 of the 2025 WNBA Finals . Jackie Young had 32 points while four-time MVP A'ja Wilson had 28 points and 14 rebounds . despite a quiet scoring performance, Alyssa Thomas passed Courtney Vandersloot to become the all-time leader in postseason assists .

title: Sorting out the bowl picture after another weekend of surprises
content: two preseason college football playoff contenders lost to opponents who had disappointed . last season's inaugural 12-team CFP, the five highest-ranked conference champions will make the field . the other eight teams will meet in first-round games at the campus sites of seeds Nos. 5 through 8 .

title: Power Rankings, X factors and predictions for all 32 NHL teams
content: the opening night of the 2025-26 NHL season is Tuesday . this preview will serve you all the key intel you need on all 32 teams, including strengths, weaknesses, X factors, most likely award winners, fantasy tips and a bold prediction .
